responses.name: Paola
responses.question1: Hardworking, friendly, respectful, unconditional, loving, I enjoy arts, architecture, and music.
responses.question2: Respect, equality, love for what we do, what we are, and for those around us.
responses.question3:
strengths: "Proactivity or initiative, perseverance, and versatility.",
weaknesses: "Impatience, stubbornness, and impunctuality."
responses.question4: I try to handle problems with tranquility to avoid stress and desperation.
responses.question5:
"family": "My goal is to support my children and raise them to be good individuals who can face the world without fear.",
"personal": "Personally, I aim to continue my studies and contribute to the growth of my region."
responses.question6: My hobbies include traveling, biking, and spending time with my family.
responses.question7: Some of my achievements include completing my degree, having children, turning project designs into reality, and changing my lifestyle habits.
responses.question8: In my free time, I enjoy biking, resting, and sharing moments with my family.
responses.question9: I can interact both physically and digitally.
responses.question10: My principle is to live my life without causing harm to anyone and respecting the rights of others.
responses.question11: Although I may not be skilled at making jokes or being funny, I genuinely enjoy humor.
responses.question12: Becoming a parent for the first time completely transformed my life, altering the way I perceive and experience it.
responses.question13: Life appears to be challenging and difficult to navigate, but when faced with adversity, I focus on taking it "one day at a time" to live and resolve it.
responses.question14: Success holds great importance to me and serves as my daily motivation. I consistently strive to achieve it.
responses.question15:
"values": "I value humility, respect, and empathy.",
"professional": "Professionally, I always aspire to give more and deliver my best."
responses.question16: Although I haven't encountered many difficult decisions, I prioritize and mentally analyze situations before making choices that benefit me personally and professionally.
responses.question17:
"books": "I prefer reading simple and explicit books on artistic, architectural, and self-improvement topics of interest.",
"movies": "While I watch movies for enjoyment, they don't necessarily reflect my personality."
responses.question18: While I haven't been actively pursuing extensive learning in my field, I have focused on self-discovery and managing my impulses and fears.
responses.question19: Handling disagreements isn't always easy, possibly due to my boss's closed-mindedness. However, I believe in my ability to listen and strive for balanced agreements to enhance our work.
responses.question20: I desire that people recognize my capabilities without being influenced by appearances or stereotypes. It saddens me when individuals judge others without understanding their true essence. I wish everyone would embrace this mindset, as it discourages me from interacting with others.
